title: Right of corporation to acquire its own shares
context: [ยง415A-7] Right of corporation to acquire its own shares. A professional corporation may purchase its own shares from a disqualified person without regard to the availability of capital or surplus for such purchase; provided no purchase of or payment for its own shares shall be made at a time when the corporation is insolvent or when such purchase or payment would make it insolvent. [L 1985, c 259, pt of ยง1]
